text: This chapter does not affect any obligation of a corporation or transfer agent with respect to estate, inheritance, succession, or other taxes imposed by the laws of the District of Columbia.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 28-2909.

1973 Ed., § 28-2909.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 9 of the Uniform Act for Simplification of Fiduciary Security Transfers. See 7C Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 28-2909

Current through December 11, 2012
